alert.note: Alert for Benton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:40PM CDT until July 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Benton County in east central Iowa... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dysart to Meskwaki Casino, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belle Plaine, Atkins, Walford, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Keystone, Norway, Luzerne, Hannen Lake Park and Watkins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
